darkhistory.spec¶

Modules for the manipulation of spectral data.

Sub-Modules

darkhistory.spec.spectrum The Spectrum class.
darkhistory.spec.spectra The Spectra class.
darkhistory.spec.spectools Functions useful for processing spectral data.
darkhistory.spec.transferfunction Contains functions and classes for transfer functions.
